text: Niki Yang (born in Seoul, South Korea on June 8, 1985) is a South Korean writer, animator, storyboard artist and voice actress. She is best known for voicing BMO and Lady Rainicorn on the Cartoon Network series Adventure Time. ==Other websites== * Official blog * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Writers from Seoul Category:Actors from Seoul Category:South Korean voice actors
title: Niki Yang
